pageProduct.name: Thompson's Slippery Elm Bark 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Slippery Elm Bark traditionally been used in Western herbal medicine to help relieve mild stomach and bowel inflammation.

Thompson's Slippery Elm Bark is formulated into a chewable tablet for convenience. Slippery Elm Bark swells upon contact with water, thereby providing a soothing demulcent effect. It has been used traditionally in Western herbal medicine to help soothe mucus membranes throughout the digestive tract. In traditional Western herbal medicine, it is used to:

- Help relieve mild gastrointestinal tract inflammation
- As a demulcent to soothe irritated tissues
- Assist with recovery from illness and as a nutritive tonic
- Soothe respiratory tract mucous membranes
- Relieve mild throat irritation & inflammation
- Reduce coughing

Suitable For: Vegetarian/Vegan friendly.

Size: 60 Tablets

Oil-Free?: Yes

Shelf Life in Days: 1095

KEY FEATURES

• Helps relieve mild gastrointestinal tract inflammation
• Assists with recovery from illness and as a nutritive tonic
• Soothes respiratory tract mucous membranes
• Relieves mild throat irritation & inflammation
• Reduces coughing
• Vegetarian/Vegan friendly

Warnings

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.

CAUTION

Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken.
Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each tablet contains:
Ulmus rubra (Slippery Elm) inner stem bark powder 800mg.

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Artificial Preservatives| Dairy| Egg| Fish| Gluten| Lactose| Nuts| Sesame Seeds| Soy| Sugar

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Remove cap and recycle glass.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
